LAYOUTS
=======

Templates are contained in a single file.
You can 


THE CANONICAL TEMPLATE EXAMPLE
==============================

<html>
  <head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    
    <!-- basic meta information -->
    <title>{{account.title}}</title>
    <meta name="description" content="{{account.settings.tagline}}">
    
    <!-- automatically generated tailwind css for just this template -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" url="/{{account.cname}}/tailwind.min.css">
    
    <!-- og:xxx data for social embedding -->
		<meta property="og:title" content="{{og.title}}">
		<meta property="og:site_name" content="{{account.name}}">
		<meta property="og:type" content="{{og.type}}">
		<meta property="og:url" content="{{og.url}}">
		<meta property="og:image" content="{{og.image}}">    
    
    <!-- favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" href="{{account.settings.logo_small}}" type="image/x-icon">
    
  </head>
</html>
